::DrillBit::

DrillBit gets StarScreams message.
"Oh, great!" He runs into range, and shoots all weopons, blowing up the
entrance, so they can escape.
"Hury, get to the Phobia's ship, over there. The base goes boom, in less
then two minutes. He starts running for the ship.
